The one necessary thing to be sought briefly touched in a four-fold dialogue upon some of the great and most concerning truths of practical religion. Fleming, Robert, 1630-1694. Fleming, Robert, 1660?-1716.
[23], 64 p.
s.n.], [S.l. : 1679.
Wing attributes this work to Robert Fleming the younger, however NUC pre-1956 imprints attributes it to the elder Fleming. Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======
